title: Not against incentives on EVs, high number of road accidents one of the dark issues for my ministry: Nitin Gadkari
description: Nitin Gadkari, India's road transport minister, acknowledged the high rate of road accidents and fatalities as a significant issue despite government efforts. He also mentioned that electric vehicle makers may not need continued sales incentives due to rising volumes and falling battery prices, but he wouldn't oppose subsidies if the Ministry of Heavy Industries supports them.
